TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CodePagesEncodingProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 針對桌面 .NET Framework 所支援但 UWP App 不支援的字碼頁，提供其編碼提供者的存取權。

span.span: Provides access to an encoding provider for code pages supported in the desktop .NET Framework but not in UWP apps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > .NET 原生實作中的.NET Core 僅支援類別。The class is supported in the .NET Native implementation of .NET Core only. .NET Framework for Windows desktop 支援 Unicode 和程式碼頁編碼方式的大型集合。The .NET Framework for the Windows desktop supports a large set of Unicode and code page encodings. 通用 Windows 平台和.NET Native，相反地，支援下列編碼方式：The Universal Windows platform and .NET Native, on the other hand, support only the following encodings: - ASCII （字碼頁為 20127），由屬性。ASCII (code page 20127), which is returned by the property. - ISO 8859-1 （字碼頁 28591）。ISO-8859-1 (code page 28591). - Utf-7 （字碼頁為 65000），傳回屬性。UTF-7 (code page 65000), which is returned by the property. - Utf-8 （字碼頁 65001），傳回屬性。UTF-8 (code page 65001), which is returned by the property. - Utf-16 和 UTF-16LE （字碼頁為 1200年），傳回屬性。UTF-16 and UTF-16LE (code page 1200), which is returned by the property. - UTF-16BE （字碼頁為 1201年），這藉由呼叫具現化或具有建構函式`bigEndian`值`true`。UTF-16BE (code page 1201), which is instantiated by calling the or constructor with a `bigEndian` value of `true`. - Utf-32 和 UTF-32LE （字碼頁為 12000），傳回屬性。UTF-32 and UTF-32LE (code page 12000), which is returned by the property. - UTF-32BE （字碼頁 12001），這藉由呼叫具現化建構函式`bigEndian`參數，並提供值`true`方法呼叫中。UTF-32BE (code page 12001), which is instantiated by calling an constructor that has a `bigEndian` parameter and providing a value of `true` in the method call. 除了字碼頁 20127，不支援字碼頁編碼方式。Other than code page 20127, code page encodings are not supported. 類別會擴充將這些字碼頁提供用於.NET 原生和通用 Windows 平台 (UWP) 應用程式。The class extends to make these code pages available to .NET Native and Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps. 若要使用這些額外的字碼頁，您執行下列作業：To use these additional code pages, you do the following: - System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll 組件的參考加入至您的專案。Add a reference to the System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll assembly to your project. - 擷取靜態物件屬性。Retrieve a object from the static property. - 將 物件傳遞至 方法。Pass the object to the method. 之後登錄物件，它支援的編碼方式可呼叫的多載; 您不應該呼叫多載。After an object is registered, the encodings that it supports are available by calling the overloads of ; you should not call the overloads.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Instance As EncodingProvider
public: static property System::Text::EncodingProvider ^ Instance { System::Text::EncodingProvider ^ get(); };

summary.span: 針對桌面 .NET Framework 所支援但目前 .NET Framework 平台不支援的字碼頁，取得其編碼提供者。

span.span: Gets an encoding provider for code pages supported in the desktop .NET Framework but not in the current .NET Framework platform.

value.span: 可讓您存取目前的.NET Framework 平台不支援的編碼方式編碼提供者。

span.span: An encoding provider that allows access to encodings not supported on the current .NET Framework platform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回編碼方式為提供應用程式為目標的物件[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]或更新版本，否則都只在 Windows 桌面上的.NET Framework。The property returns an object that makes encodings available to apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] or a later version and that otherwise are available only in the .NET Framework on the Windows desktop. 在 Windows 桌面上的.NET Framework 支援大量的字元編碼方式和字碼頁。The .NET Framework on the Windows desktop supports a large number of character encodings and code pages. 您可以藉由呼叫取得編碼方式的完整清單方法，這是在 Windows 桌面上完整的.NET Framework 中可用。You can get a complete list of encodings by calling the method, which is available in the full .NET Framework on the Windows desktop. .NET 原生用於 UWP 應用程式，相反地，只有下列編碼預設支援：.NET Native for UWP apps, on the other hand, supports only the following encodings by default: - ASCII （字碼頁為 20127），由屬性。ASCII (code page 20127), which is returned by the property. - ISO 8859-1 （字碼頁 28591）。ISO-8859-1 (code page 28591). - Utf-7 （字碼頁為 65000），傳回屬性。UTF-7 (code page 65000), which is returned by the property. - Utf-8 （字碼頁 65001），傳回屬性。UTF-8 (code page 65001), which is returned by the property. - Utf-16 和 UTF-16LE （字碼頁為 1200年），傳回屬性。UTF-16 and UTF-16LE (code page 1200), which is returned by the property. - UTF-16BE （字碼頁為 1201年），這藉由呼叫具現化或具有建構函式`bigEndian`值`true`。UTF-16BE (code page 1201), which is instantiated by calling the or constructor with a `bigEndian` value of `true`. - Utf-32 和 UTF-32LE （字碼頁為 12000），傳回屬性。UTF-32 and UTF-32LE (code page 12000), which is returned by the property. - UTF-32BE （字碼頁 12001），這藉由呼叫具現化建構函式`bigEndian`參數，並提供值`true`方法呼叫中。UTF-32BE (code page 12001), which is instantiated by calling an constructor that has a `bigEndian` parameter and providing a value of `true` in the method call. 若要擷取目前在.NET Framework 在 Windows 桌面上，但不是在 UWP 應用程式中的編碼方式，您執行下列作業：To retrieve an encoding that is present in the .NET Framework on the Windows desktop but not in UWP apps, you do the following: - System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll 組件的參考加入至您的專案。Add a reference to the System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll assembly to your project. - 取得靜態物件屬性。Get the object from the static property. - 傳遞物件方法所提供的編碼方式common language runtime 提供的物件。Pass the object to the method to make the encodings supplied by the object available to the common language runtime. - 呼叫多載來擷取的編碼方式。Call an overload to retrieve the encoding. 方法會呼叫對應方法，以判斷是否可以提供要求之編碼方式。The method will call the corresponding method to determine whether it can supply the requested encoding.
